EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account (1357668043.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account (1357668043.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Denise, Per the introduction from Jess, I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all returning alumni and new associate requests. I would like to take a few minutes to speak with you either today or tomorrow to find out more about you and the work you are interested in running through MBO and I will also be able to answer any quesitons you have about benefits. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> I look forward to speaking with you soon! Thank you, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jessica Hartman Sent: Tuesday, January 08, 2013 11:11 AM To: denise@moneywizdom.com Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account Denise, Long time no talk! How have you been? Hope you enjoyed the holidays, and Happy New Year to you as well J I am still here, but I have taken on a different position  Im actually managing a team of Business Managers now. Ive copied Nicolette Taylor on this email  shes been here for a while, so she knows her stuff and will take great care of you! Shell reach out to you shortly, but should you need to reach her, you can get her at ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>, or directly at 703.793.6281. Great to have you back Denise J Jess From: denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com> [mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>] Sent: Monday, January 07, 2013 7:33 PM To: Jessica Hartman Subject: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account Jessica Happy New Year! It has been over a year, so I am not sure if you are still in your job with MBO. If you are, I would love to talk to you about reactivating and also getting information on benefits again. Please let me know if you are still the right person to work with Cheers Denise Denise LaBuda415 721-7794 (o)415 306 2980 (c)www.moneywizdom.com <http://www.moneywizdom.com>Enlightened parents. Money-savvy kids. -------- Original Message -------- Subject: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account From: Jessica Hartman <jhartman@mbopartners.com <mailto:jhartman@mbopartners.com>> Date: Tue, November 01, 2011 11:50 am To: "denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>" <denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>>Thanks so much Denise  its associates like you that make our job worthwhile, and the ones that are hardest to let go. So please please please make sure you come back J Jess From: denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com> [mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>] Sent: Tuesday, November 01, 2011 2:39 PM To: Jessica Hartman Subject: RE: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account Jessica Thanks for the kind words - and note on wrapping up my MBO contract for now!Thanks also for all of your help, your service standards are par excellant!I will raise my hand when I find work that can bring me back to MBO and I will continue to refer! Cheers and happy post Halloween! Denise Denise LaBuda415 721-7794 (o)415 306 2980 (c)www.moneywizdom.com <http://www.moneywizdom.com>Enlightened parents. Money-savvy kids. -------- Original Message -------- Subject: MBO Partners: Inactivating Your Account From: Jessica Hartman <jhartman@mbopartners.com <mailto:jhartman@mbopartners.com>> Date: Mon, October 31, 2011 3:30 pm To: "denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>" <denise@moneywizdom.com <mailto:denise@moneywizdom.com>>Dear Denise Congratulations on your full time position! We are sorry to hear that you will be leaving MBO, but, of course, wish you the best of luck. Your account inactivation has occurred today, 10/31/2011. Once all contributions have been posted, you may have your 401(k) funds transferred to a new retirement plan, or you may elect to continue your portfolio with Fidelity. Contributions will post to your Fidelity account within approximately two weeks of the last payroll. To manage your retirement options, please contact Fidelity directly at www.401kxpress.com <http://www.401kxpress.com> or via phone at (800) 294-401K. While you are no longer an active Associate, we encourage you to stay involved with our constantly growing online community. There are many ways to connect: Our Connection Center where you can post your resume and network with other Associates; our Consulting Blog, http://www.mbopartners.com/blog <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog>; our MBO Partners Facebook Fan Page; LinkedIn; and Twitter where you can follow @MBOPartners and other executives. We appreciate the time you have spent as our Associate, and we hope that we will be able to support you and your business again in the future. As you continue to work amongst the best in your field, you qualify to earn a bonus for every successful Associate you refer to us. Please contact me for more information on our referral program. Please let me know if you have any further questions. We wish you well, and should your situation ever change, please contact me so we can bring you back on board! Sincerely, Jess___________________________________Jessica HartmanTeam ManagerMBO Partners t: 703.793.6027f: 703.793.6074e: jhartman@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. </bod
